mapper.update: insert into data_metrics_day (select null, a.user_id, a.device_id, a.mapping_id, DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-01'), DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y'), sum(a.bytes_in+a.bytes_out), now() from data_metrics a WHERE a.create_date = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') HAVING a.user_id is not null )
